title: IP Sloppy Joes
directions: On the saute setting, brown meat, sprinkle with seasoned salt & pepper, with the onion and pepper, until no longer raw. Drain and return to IP, add remaining ingredients, cook with valve closed for 20 minutes, I used bean cycle. Complete pressure release and serve.
ingredients: 1 pound ground beef, turkey or chicken
seasoned salt and freshly ground black pepper (no more than 1/2 tsp)
1 tsp dry mustard (may use prepared if you don't have dry on hand)
